item.description:
Join us for dinner and then some wild karaoke at the Koy Bar and Lounge at Butterfly in West Harford. There is a great review on the Courant's website at http://www.ctnow.com/.... Meet for dinner first and then enjoy the entertainment. They have a happy hour from 4:30-7pm so feel free to drop by earlier. Not sure if I can get there by 4:30pm but I hope to arrive before 7pm. I went here a few weeks ago and had a blast!
NickiJ has offered to organize this one since my son is not feeling well. I may be able to make it but I'm not sure right now. Nicki will be there at about 6pm to hang out a little early if anyone wants to join her. She has offered her cell phone in case anyone needs it...860-307-1550. Thanks, Nicki!
P.S. On their website, it states that there is a $3 cover charge. When I went, they did not charge us but just be prepared that they might.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and Karaoke at Butterfly
